WPFInstallzotero.description: Zotero is a free, easy-to-use tool to help you collect, organize, cite, and share your research materials.

WPFInstallpowerbi.description: Create stunning reports and visualizations with Power BI Desktop. It puts visual analytics at your fingertips with intuitive report authoring. Drag-and-drop to place content exactly where you want it on the flexible and fluid canvas. Quickly discover patterns as you explore a single unified view of linked, interactive visualizations.

WPFInstallplex.description: Plex Media Server is a media server software that allows you to organize and stream your media library. It supports various media formats and offers a wide range of features.

WPFInstallventoy.description: Ventoy is an open-source tool for creating bootable USB drives. It supports multiple ISO files on a single USB drive, making it a versatile solution for installing operating systems.

WPFInstalltotalcommander.description: Total Commander is a file manager for Windows that provides a powerful and intuitive interface for file management.
